Judul: APAKAH SERIKAT PEKERJA DIPERLUKAN DI INDUSTRI MINYAK & GAS MALAYSIA? SEBUAH STUDI KASUS PERUSAHAAN BASIS PASOKAN DI KEMAMAN
Abstrak:
The aim of this article is to demonstrate how necessary is a trade union for the oil and
gas sector in Malaysia which is not currently available and how it could play a role to guarantee
good employment prospects, safe working conditions and job satisfaction, and above all, the
protection of human rights.
Kata Kunci: Oil and Gas, Malaysia; Kemaman; Supply Chain
